name: OrganizationPermission
description: OrganizationPermissions limit what a user can do in an Organization. By default, everyone who has access to an organization, can access basic organization data.

values.ORGANIZATION_UPDATE: Update the organizations data, such as billing information, address, and contact.
values.ORGANIZATION_DELETE: Delete child organizations. You cannot delete your own organization. To delete your organization, contact support.
values.PROCESS_POINTS: List process points, see their details
values.ASSETS_UPDATE: Create and update assets, such as their display name and tags. Includes ASSETS permission.
values.PROCESS_POINTS_UPDATE: Create and update process points, such as their display name and tags. Includes PROCESS_POINTS permission.
values.ASSETS_VALUES: Read asset values, e.g. pressure measurements.
values.PROCESS_POINTS_VALUES: Read process point values, e.g. pressure measurements.
values.MODEMS: List modems, see their details and health
values.MODEMS_CREATE: Create new modems. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEMS_UPDATE: Update modems, such as their peripherals, display name and tags. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEMS_UPDATE_FILES: Update modems files, such as photo's of the installation.
values.MODEMS_LICENSE_KEYS: Show and regenerate license keys. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEMS_MESSAGE_BODY_PARSERS: Manage and assign message body parsers. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEMS_SECURE_NOTES: Show and update secure notes. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEMS_ALARMS: View and assign (with the ASSIGNMENTS permission) alarms. Includes MODEMS permission.
values.MODEM_MESSAGES_SEND_TEST_MESSAGES: Send modem messages using the TestingService. Does not include MODEMS or MESSAGES permission.
values.MODEM_MESSAGES_SEND_REAL_MESSAGES: Send modem messages using real message sources (i.e. gateway). Does not include MODEMS or MESSAGES permission.
values.TRANSFERS: See the transfers to/from other organizations.
values.USERS: List all users, see their names and email addresses.
values.USERS_MANAGE: Approve or create new users, remove users from the organization. Includes USERS permission.
values.PUBLISHERS: Manage publishers: webhooks, MQTT integration and custom email publishers.
values.CERTIFICATES: Read and use uploaded certificates (used by publishers).
values.CERTIFICATES_MANAGE: Upload certificates, and update or delete uploaded certificates.
values.ASSIGNMENTS: Manage assignments using the assignment services and individual calls on, for example, ModemService.
values.SIMULATION_MANAGE: Manage simulations, like modem message simulation.
values.LOCATIONS_MANAGE: Manage saved locations using the OrganizationLocationService.
values.TAGS_MANAGE: Create, edit and delete tags. Viewing tags is always allowed.
values.FILES_UPLOAD: Upload new files. Includes FILES permission.

name: SupportPermission
description: SupportPermissions are used for features typically reserved for customer support, or that behave differently when used by a customer support operator.

values.MANAGE_DEVICE_TYPE: Change the device type for devices.
values.MANAGE_DEVICE_SLA: Manage device SLA values (minimum messages per day).
values.DEVICE_VIEW_ALL_LIFECYCLES: View all lifecycles. Without this permission, you can only see INSTALLED and PAUSED.
values.MANAGE_FILES: Remove files from devices, process points, tags and the system entirely.

name: UserPermission
description: UserPermissions are generally used to limit what a token can do to its user. By default, a user has all UserPermissions, which apply only to himself. When creating a token, however, the token typically does not need permission to affect the user at all.

values.READ: Read your name, email, linked organizations and mission-control settings.
values.UPDATE: Update your personal information, mission-control settings and default organization. Includes read permission.
values.REQUEST_ACCESS: Request access to an organization and cancel open requests. Does not include read permission.
values.DELETE: Delete your user account permanently. Includes read permission.
